snippet: Lleyton Hewitt of Australia captured his 30th career ATP title, defeating Ivo Karlovic of Croatia, 6-3, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (3), in the final of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
abstract: Lleyton Hewitt captures his 30th career ATP title, defeating Ivo Karlovic in men's final of Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, RI; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt of Australia captured his 30th career ATP title, defeating Ivo Karlovic of Croatia, 6-3, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (3), in the final of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
